about_the_game:
Show your support for NS2 Development with the purchase of this special limited time offer DLC. Purchase of this DLC pack will get you our newest and unique skins for both the Marine and Alien classes, plus over the next few months of development anyone that owns this DLC will unlock future items at no additional cost!

An Elite TSF Marine unit codenamed: SANDSTORM, has been deployed to the battle field in an effort to stop a new evolution of the Kharaa. Almost Toxic in nature, this new Kharaa body type is like nothing seen before. Reports talk of emissive green glows reported in the battlefield only add to the creepy and still unknown nature of this evolution.
detailed_description:
Show your support for NS2 Development with the purchase of this special limited time offer DLC. Purchase of this DLC pack will get you our newest and unique skins for both the Marine and Alien classes, plus over the next few months of development anyone that owns this DLC will unlock future items at no additional cost!

An Elite TSF Marine unit codenamed: SANDSTORM, has been deployed to the battle field in an effort to stop a new evolution of the Kharaa. Almost Toxic in nature, this new Kharaa body type is like nothing seen before. Reports talk of emissive green glows reported in the battlefield only add to the creepy and still unknown nature of this evolution.
name: Natural Selection 2 - Catalyst Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista 64-bit or newer
  • Processor:Core 2 Duo E6700 (2.66 GHz) or better
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9 compatible dedicated video card with 1 GB VRAM and support for Shader Model 3 (e.g. AMD X800, NVidia 8600 or better)
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor:Core 2 Quad Q9650 (3 GHz) or better
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9 compatible dedicated video card with 1.5 - 2 GB VRAM (AMD 5770, NVidia GTX 450 or better)
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Show your support for NS2 Development with the purchase of this special limited time offer DLC. Purchase of this DLC pack will get you our newest and unique skins for both the Marine and Alien classes, plus over the next few months of development anyone that owns this DLC will unlock future items at no additional cost!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Finnish, Romanian, Swedish, Czech
*languages with full audio support
